namaste_desc: An exclusive Snowchaser EMOTE for purchasing from THE ARMORY!
welcome_to_crafting_desc: Bonus Spirit for disenchanting your first card! You can craft a Rare card for 100 Spirit.
bloodborn_desc: You've unlocked all the Basic cards for one Faction! Enjoy this one-time bonus Spirit Orb!
world_explorer_desc: Congratulations on playing 1 game with each Faction! Enjoy this hard-to-get LEGENDARY rarity Faction card to bolster your Collection!
best_of_friends_desc: DUELYST is more fun with friends!
entering_gauntlet_desc: Congratulations on your first 20 ranked games! You've received a special free invitation to enter The Gauntlet!
helping_hand_desc: Congratulations on your first 10 games! A special gift just for you!
art_of_war_desc: Congratulations on your first 50 games! A humble gift on your path to greatness!
collector_supreme_desc: Congratulations on collecting all Core set Common cards! A RARE and an EPIC card to help you collect the rest!
earth_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Magmar Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Earth Sister!
key_mythron_desc: You've received your first Mystery Crate full of cosmetics! Here's a free key to open it!
storm_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Songhai Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Storm Sister!
sand_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Vetruvian Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Sand Sister!
shadow_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Abyssian Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Shadow Sister!
sun_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Lyonar Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Sun Sister!
sworn_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Neutral Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Sworn Sister!
wind_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Vanar Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Wind Sister!
epic_questor_desc: Epic! Enjoy your awesome hard-to-get EPIC rarity card. You've earned it!
indomitable_spirit_desc: Exalted Questor! Bonus 100 Gold as we honor your dedication and indomitable spirit!
journeyman_questor_desc: Congratulations on completing your first Quest! Enjoy this amazing EPIC rarity card to boost your Collection!
legendary_questor_desc: Legendary! Enjoy your amazing hard-to-get LEGENDARY rarity card. You've earned it!
silver_division_desc: Now comes the next challenge -- climbing the ladder to Gold Division! A bonus Spirit Orb to help you on your way!
referral_desc: One of your referred friends just made a purchase!
wartech_general_achievement_desc: Congratulations on unlocking the {{faction_name}} Immortal Vanguard General!
early_feb_2018_login_achievement_desc: A special gift because we love you!
